The Best Content Marketing
AI Agent
hero.subtitle: From today on, easily manage your social media with AI. AITOEARN provides one-stop capabilities from creative inspiration, content creation, content distribution to content interaction management, making AI within reach.

upcomingSection.title: Full-Stack AI-Powered Content Growth & Monetization Platform

smartImport.title: Smart Import
smartImport.description: Import historical content for fast re-editing & redistribution. Example: Sync your Xiaohongshu posts to YouTube in one click.

analytics.title: Content Analytics — Full-Funnel Data
analytics.description: Cross-Platform Comparison: One platform may block traffic, but others won't. End-to-End Monitoring: Track performance and build your path to 1M+ followers.

aiCreation.title: AI Content Creation — End-to-End Assistant
aiCreation.description: AI Copywriting: Auto-generate titles, captions & descriptions. AI Commenting: Engage proactively, attract traffic. Image & Card Generator: Speed up content workflows. Supported AI Video Models and Image Models.

marketplace.title: Content Marketplace — Trade & Monetize
marketplace.description: Creators: Sell your content directly, find buyers fast. Brands: Purchase ready-made, high-quality content. AI-Powered Growth: Let's use AI to earn. Let's earn money together!

downloadSection.title: Start Creating Anytime, Anywhere
downloadSection.description: With the AI ToEarn mobile app, your creativity is no longer limited to desktop. We also provide iOS and Android mobile apps for you to unleash your creativity anytime, anywhere, with just one phone!

enterpriseSection.title: Professional AI Social Media Solutions
enterpriseSection.subtitle: Enterprise AI marketing transformation requires not just tools, but solid infrastructure. AI ToEarn provides a reliable platform to distribute AI content creation capabilities across multiple departments for unparalleled marketing efficiency.

testimonial.quote: In today's highly competitive content marketing landscape, rapid validation and creation tools are not just helpful—they're essential for survival. For marketing companies like ours, AI ToEarn provides indispensable value in this AI frontier.
testimonial.author: John Smith
testimonial.title: Content Operations Director at Leading MCN Agency

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Instructions
dataDeletion.prelaunch: Our application is currently in pre-launch phase and does not store real user data. If you have interacted with our test systems, contact us for data removal.
